oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tamme explains that his people respect the eland ('with certain observances'). 1) The |xam narratives contain numerous references to their respect for the eland (see Ssa ka Kumm in |xam Books V-17 and V-18 ), 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-10.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Respecting the eland
